title: Play School. The road show
brief_description: Five Play School presenters sing songs, tell stories and play games about cars, buses and bikes - and about how to be safe on the road. Presenters include Benita Collings, John Hamblin, Noni Hazelhurst, Simon Burke, George Spartels.
